items.text: slower ball that cuts back in to take the inside edge to square leg. Played outside the line. Would've been plumb had he missed.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: there for a slash outside off, left alone.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: stands tall and punches this back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: stands tall and punches this length ball to cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: slider on middle, defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: backs away, bowler follows him, Gayle mistimes a hoick to deep midwicket off a thick inside edge. Didn't get to the pitch
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: punches this length ball to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: another wild swing, another inside edge. This time towards deep square
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: gets outside the line and drives to cover point.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: turns this shortish delivery to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.preText: Gayle has been kept quiet again. His timing has been off, but can't be faulted for lack of intent The other noticeable thing: his looking out for quick singles. Here's Mustafizur. First change
items.text: flicked to the midwicket region. Started off with a leg-stump half-volley
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, 2 runs

items.preText: Phani has a pertinent question: "Why would Windies prepare these slow low pitches that suit opposition and that doesn't support their bang bang batting style?" -- Suppose it's also a question of being unable to tamper with the basic characteristic of a surface
items.text: muscles this pull, no one at deep midwicket. Bullets to the fence. Dropped short, Gayle was ready
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, FOUR runs

items.preText: Anand has an interesting theory on why batsmen review lbws: "During school days playing, we just took out LBW, no one was happy to be out that way. May be that's why LBW always has to be reviewed. Just extension of school days cricket."
items.text: punched to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run

items.text: turns this down to fine leg.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: driven to cover where there's a misfield
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: defends this length ball carefully.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run

items.text: turns this to square leg
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: pulled to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Karan: "With all due respect irrespective of the conditions you can't afford a bloke like hope at 3 in modern cricket specially in shorter format." -- In a rebuilding side, you need to show more faith and confidence in the guys who have shown spark, even if the performances may have eluded them thus far
items.text: punched to wide long-off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: reaches out and drives into the gap at cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: swept fiercely into the gap. Spinning into middle and leg, picked well to deep square fence
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: punched, good stop by short mid-on running across.
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, no run

items.preText: Phani: "Fizz is in line to join the list of those wonder kid bowlers who tormented batsmen for a series or two and then were pummeled later. He looks in no rhythm or doesn't seem capable of taking wickets on his own. What went wrong after that injury?" -- Possibly after-effects of the injury. Still working his way back up. Didn't do too badly in the first game
items.text: punches this length ball back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run

items.text: eases this short of length ball to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run

items.text: cuts back in to beat Gayle comprehensively. He looked to loft over the bowler's head, but feet rooted to the crease. Nearly wedged through the gap gap
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, no run
